com.ayoungbear.distbtsync.spring.redis

类 RedisSyncMethodInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ayoungbear.distbtsync.spring.aop.AbstractSyncMethodInterceptor
      • com.ayoungbear.distbtsync.spring.aop.AbstractSyncInvocationSupport
        • com.ayoungbear.distbtsync.spring.redis.RedisSyncMethodInterceptor
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    MethodBasedExpressionResolver<String>, org.aopalliance.aop.Advice, org.aopalliance.intercept.Interceptor, org.aopalliance.intercept.MethodInterceptor, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanFactoryAware, org.springframework.core.Ordered

    public class RedisSyncMethodInterceptor
extends AbstractSyncInvocationSupport
implements MethodBasedExpressionResolver<String>
    基于 Redis 的同步方法调用拦截器, 根据方法上下文提供相应的 Synchronizer 来执行同步操作. 需要同步的方法或者方法所属的类需要标记 @RedisSync 注解, 并指定同步操作相关的属性信息.
    作者:
    yangzexiong
    另请参阅:
    RedisSync

    • 字段概要

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.springframework.core.Ordered

        HIGHEST_PRECEDENCE, LOWEST_PRECEDENCE

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明

      RedisSyncMethodInterceptor(RedisSynchronizerProvider synchronizerProvider, MethodBasedExpressionResolver<String> exprResolver, SyncMethodFailureHandler defaultHandler)
